channel.title: Donator shop
channel.description: how do i make a shop you cant trade unless donator?

item.title: Donator shop
item.dc:creator: @code4fun code4fun
item.description:
@code4fun wrote:

[quote=“powerknite7, post:2, topic:280017”]Well, here’s an example.

if(NPCID == ####){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; }

You would change that to this:

if(NPCID == ####){ if(donator == 1){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else sM("You must be a donator to trade me!!"); }

thats it hope it helped .[/quote]tyvm lol

Read full topic

item.title: Donator shop
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

Well, here’s an example.

if(NPCID == ####){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; }

You would change that to this:

if(NPCID == ####){ if(donator == 1){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else sM("You must be a donator to trade me!!"); }

thats it hope it helped .
